item.title: Report X-2023080898
item.description:
Report X-2023080898

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-11T03:12:58+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-06
  • City: TROUTDALE
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: 1. X-2023080898 SequenceEvent: PACKAGE CAME TO QA LEAKING. UPON CLOSER IN SPECTION FOUND THAT THE PLASTIC BOTTLES HAD LOOSE CAPS CAUSING THE CONTENTS TO LEAK OUT. PACKAGE APPEARED TO HAVE BEEN LOADED AT PREVOUS LOCATION UPSIDE DOWN. ALL EXCESS LIQUID ABSORBED BY THE BOX. BOX DRUMMED AND SENT TO THE HAZMAT CAGE. DescribePack: LOOSE CAPS AND NOT SAFTY SEALS DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: PUT IN TOTE AND BROUGHT TO QA 2. X-2023080900 SequenceEvent: PACKAGE CAME TO QA WET. UPON CLOSER INSPECTION FOUND THAT THE PLASTIC BOTTLE HAD LOOSE CAP CAUSING THEM TO LEAK INTO THE BOX. ALL EXCESS LIQUID ABSORBED BY THE BOX. BOX CONTAINED NO INNER PACKING. BOX DRUMMED AND SENT TO THE HAZMAT CAGE. DescribePack: LOOSE CPAS AND NO SAFTEY SEALS DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: PUT IN TOTE AND BROUGHT TO QA

ALL EXCESS LIQUID ABSORBED BY THE BOX. BOX DRUMMED AND SENT TO THE HAZMAT CAGE DescribePack: LOOSE CAPS DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: PUT IN TOTE AND BROUGHT TO QA

item.title: Report X-2023080382
item.description:
Report X-2023080382

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-11T03:12:58+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-29
  • City: HILLSBORO
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER WAS NOTFIED BY IRREG TRAIN DRIVER THAT A DECLARED HAZAMAT LOADED ON THE TRAIN HAD A STAIN ON IT. THE PACKAGE WAS THEN TAKEN FROM THE TRAIN TO THE PSC. UPON INSPECTION IT WAS DETERMINED THAT THE STAIN WAS CAUSED BY THE CONTENTS INSIDE THE PACKAGE. RESPONDER PROCESSED LEAKING HAZMAT THROUGH DMP.

item.title: Report I-2023080045
item.description:
Report I-2023080045

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-16T00:32:33+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-05-23
  • City: Lyons
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: NEXGEN LOGISTICS LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 1
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: The driver left the road at around 40mph for an unknown reason. We suspect he had a medical emergency. The truck crashed into several large oak trees and burst into flames. The fire burned the entire truck and truck mounted cargo tank completely down. The product in the tank burned and soaked into the soil.The driver was burned up in the cab to the point that no autopsy or testing could be done.

item.title: Report X-2023080889
item.description:
Report X-2023080889

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-16T00:32:33+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-04-27
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: QA was notified of a leaking hazmat, and we secured it in a salvage drum. DescribePack: upon inspection the lid was found to be loose, and content leaked out. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: leaking package was secured in a salvage drum.
